questions.text: Your resume highlights your experience building a reporting tool that increased efficiency by 94% in tracking website usage.  Can you describe the process of identifying the need for this tool, defining its requirements, and managing its development, emphasizing your product management approach throughout?

You analyzed 52 pitches from women entrepreneurs for Shark Tank India, noting a 55% conversion rate.  How did this analysis inform your recommendations for investment decisions, and what product management principles did you apply to improve inclusivity in the investment portfolio?

In your Pizza Sales Metrics project, you used Power BI to visualize 25+ KPIs.  Describe a scenario where data visualization was crucial in communicating insights to stakeholders and influencing product strategy. What challenges did you face in presenting complex data in an easily understandable manner?

Your experience includes developing both front-end (ReactJS, NextJS) and back-end (NodeJS, Express, MongoDB) technologies.  How would this full-stack understanding inform your prioritization decisions as a product manager, and how would you leverage this knowledge to collaborate effectively with engineering teams?

You ranked in the top 3% of the JEE exam and led your basketball team to victory.  These achievements suggest strong leadership and competitive drive. Can you describe a situation where you had to make a difficult decision under pressure, balancing competing priorities and stakeholder interests as a leader?
